title: LFT: Gold 2 mid laner
body:
Hello, this year I've been looking to get competitive and serious in terms of 5s play, however I can't seem to find a team. I'm mid laner who mains:
{{champion:55}} {{champion:61}}  but I know all mid laners to some extent. I'm really keen to endorse myself into 5s play, so if I'm welcome just add me: WQLFY.
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=WQLFY

replies.body:
If you would be interested in looking into forming a team with me let me know.
Here is a link to my info:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/smxWnEHv-gold-1-junglertopmid-lft
Also, am looking to join a team :)

Hi my name is Candy and I'm currently trialling people for my 5's team. I main support, gold 5, gold 3 last season in Solo Queue. I'm looking for people with a good attitude and minimal toxicity, I will not hesitate to kick someone from the team if they are toxic (even if they play at a challenger level). I'll add you and give you a trial, just remind me who you are if I forget.

do you play any other role? your history is good but mid is taken in the team im trying to establish, heres link http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/7OJzg2Z3-ranked-5s-team-gold-rating-oceanic-timezone
